entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
